supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 17 x 47, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (2) 46 x 31, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 23, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 56 x 26, (A) 3 lines, left (?) margin, (B) trace, (5) 58 x 38, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (6) 28 x 20, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 35 x 35, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 33 x 26, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (9) 18 x 26, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 26 x 31, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 35 x 46, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) 1 line, (12) 64 x 60, (A) 2 lines, top bottom margins, (B) blank, (13) 73 x 20, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) trace, (14) 71 x 27, (A) 3 lines, bottom (?) margin, (B) traces of 7 lines, no margins, (15) 99 x 21, (A) 8 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (16) 86 x 27, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (17) 65 x 29, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank
